main event: An unidentified flying object was observed in Kingsland, Texas on March 1, 1967, described as an extremely bright orange object that hovered and then disappeared suddenly.
interesting points: The object was described as having a teardrop shape without a peak at the top,It was estimated to be about the size of a city street lamp,The object was described as pale reddish clear white with no tail or smoke,The sighting occurred during clear nighttime conditions,The observation lasted for approximately 7 minutes.
